page.title: 04A SUPERMARKET IN JERSEY
page.content: {A SUPERMARKET IN THE 20th CENTURY { by Amanda Stott} Le Riches is a large place which sells food, fresh, canned and frozen. People buy food here because it is sometimes cheaper than small shops. The shop is open 6 days a week (not Sunday). The hours are 9 a.m.-6 p.m. The entire shop is divided into different sections -{cold meats, {cheese and frozen food.} Here is a typical weekly shopping basket for a family of 4: bread, milk, eggs, cheese, washing-up liquid, toilet roll, bacon, pork chops, beefburgers, soup, washing powder, corn flakes, Alpen, carrots, cabbage, peas, green beans, new potatoes, butter, margarine, vegetable oil, frozen chips, ice cream,chicken portions, yoghurt, fruit, roasting joint and toothpaste.
